feed.title: GitHub C Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of C in GitHub

entry.title: rswier/c4
entry.summary:
C in four functions

c4 - C in four functions

An exercise in minimalism.

Try the following:

gcc -o c4 c4.c
./c4 hello.c
./c4 -s hello.c

./c4 c4.c hello.c
./c4 c4.c c4.c hello.c
